am_devices_ssm6515.c File Reference

Analog Devices SSM6515 Digital Audio Amplifier Driver with I2C Interface. More...

Detailed Description

Analog Devices SSM6515 Digital Audio Amplifier Driver with I2C Interface.

#include "am_devices_ssm6515.h"
#include "am_bsp.h"
#include "string.h"
#include "am_util_delay.h"
#include "am_util_debug.h"
#include "am_util_stdio.h"
